description.value: This suite offers a single room, equipped with both a key and a code lock, that can house a number of prisoners equal to twice the ship's suite capacity by size, as shown in the @JournalEntry[Mnvw9iBw8gxgfCXw]{Starship Size Suite Capacity} table. Slave pen doors are magnetically sealed to prevent them opening in the event of power failure. When a creature completes a long rest involving this suite, their exhaustion level is not reduced. Additionally, for each week spent in this suite, creatures suffer 1 level of exhaustion.
